name: data-visual
description: - Make a React project with two pages: a lister with a table that shows the data in market_list.json; and another with view that shows the data in market_view.json - The pages should be responsive, In HTML without tables (only div), with minimal use of image except for the ones generated by CSS or JS. Small images are allowed but extra points if you dont use them. - Styling should be in Less, Sass or similar. - The data should not be hardcoded in the file but consumed from the .json. Data should be loaded/updated asynchronously.
